basics.name: Eric Stasney
basics.label: Business Analyst / Developer
basics.summary: Analytical professional with 2+ years of experience with accomplishing business objectives through strategic data analysis and software development.

work.name: Cisco
work.summary: Talent Hub is a small team delivering critical talent pipelines in an ever-changing environment.
highlights: Developed Data Extraction Software and deployed to AWS, supporting 40 internal users. Dramatically increased team's efficiency and quality.
Reached 2nd round of Cisco's Innovate Everywhere Challenge for proposing and building a data-driven 'Sourcing Assistant'. Alpha build available at https://estasney.pythonanywhere.com
Developed a graph-based program to assist with company name disambiguation. Available on GitHub and Pypi (company-graph).
Research and deliver Talent Trends data from unstructured, textual data. Created NLP pipeline to cluster resumes via LDA.

work.name: US Army / COARNG
work.summary: Enlisted in National Guard to serve my community, part-time. Immediately activated to Federal Service after initial training and deployed.

projects.name: Percy
highlights: 2nd round selection in Cisco's Innovate Everywhere Challenge
Showcases various techniques to optimized sourcing workflow
Integrated with Cisco's Webex Teams platform as a chatbot
